name: Block Dash - Geometry Jump
description:
Are you ready for the most challenging obstacles in block dash world?
You need to overcome various difficulties in the gemorty game to unlock each level.
Jump, fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and tricky levels!

Block Dash Features:
-Rhythm-based Action Platforming.
-Dense obstacles soar.
-Electronic style background music.
-Multiple operation modes, flying, jumping, catapulting.
-Challenge yourself with the near impossible geomatry jump obstacles.

Download Block dash now and enjoy simple one touch gameplay with many levels that will keep you entertained for hours!
